original: 出自著名的漢樂府詩《孔雀東南飛》，相傳為廬江郡小吏，娶劉蘭芝為妻。劉蘭芝不為焦母所容，命焦仲卿休妻。後劉蘭芝之兄又逼迫其改嫁。改嫁之日，劉蘭芝與焦仲卿雙雙自殺殉情
text: From the famous Han Yuefu poem "The Peacock Flies to the Southeast", it is said that he was a small official in Lujiang County and married Liu Lanzhi. Liu Lanzhi was not tolerated by Jiao's mother and ordered Jiao Zhongqing to divorce his wife. Later Liu Lanzhi's brother forced him to remarry. On the day of remarriage, Liu Lanzhi and Jiao Zhongqing both committed suicide
